articles.title: Joe Biden backs extension of war pause after latest release by Hamas | Mint - Mint
articles.description: President Joe Biden said he hopes to extend the pause in the Israeli-Hamas war beyond the original four-day deal to facilitate more hostage releases, saying the safe return of 4-year-old American girl shows that the US-brokered cease-fire is working.

articles.title: 4-year-old American Abigail Mor Edan among third group of hostages released by Hamas - CBS News
articles.description: Seventeen hostages were released — 14 Israeli citizens, which includes Abigail, who is a joint Israeli-American citizen, and three foreign nationals, Israeli officials said.
articles.content:
Washington — Abigail Mor Edan, the youngest American held hostage by Hamas, was among the hostages released by Hamas on Sunday, President Biden confirmed on Sunday.
